TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GenericWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart

summary.span: 將非 控制項的伺服器控制項包裝，以便可以在執行階段顯示和如同真正的 控制項一樣運作。

span.span: Wraps server controls that are not controls so that they can appear and behave as true controls at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項以提供不是伺服器控制項的執行階段包裝函式則控制項，因此，這類控制項可以使用網頁組件頁面和應用程式中。The control exists to provide a run-time wrapper for server controls that are not controls, so that such controls can be used in Web Parts pages and applications. 當開發人員將伺服器控制項，例如使用者控制項、 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項或現有的自訂控制項，為控制項，控制項自動換行的伺服器控制項在執行階段讓它們可以展現相同為 true 的功能控制項。When developers add server controls--such as user controls, ASP.NET server controls, or existing custom controls--to a control, the control automatically wraps the server controls at run time so they can exhibit the same functionality as true controls. 下表會比較和對照控制項和控制項。The following table compares and contrasts controls and controls. | 控制項 control| 控制項 control| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |若要讓伺服器控制項不存在機制來控制的 Web 組件的功能，因此讓任何 ASP.NET 中，自訂或使用者控制項，可以參與 Web 組件的應用程式。Exists to equip server controls that are not controls with Web Parts functionality, so that any ASP.NET, custom, or user control can participate in Web Parts applications.|若要建立具有原生內建的 Web 組件功能的自訂 ASP.NET 控制項的存在。Exists to create custom ASP.NET controls that have native Web Parts functionality built in. 這包括個人化、 連線、 匯入和匯出，以及拖放功能。This includes personalization, connections, import and export, and drag-and-drop capabilities.| |永遠不會在網頁標記中宣告。Is never declared in the markup of a page. 只將伺服器控制項包裝在執行階段，並為提供的已包裝的控制項 （或子控制項） 的完整功能存在控制項。It exists only to wrap server controls at run time, and to give the wrapped control (or child control) the full functionality of a control.|可以是標記中宣告的頁面在設計階段，例如 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，不同之處在於其宣告中區域。Can be declared in the markup of a page at design time, like an ASP.NET server control, except that it is declared in a zone.| |包含，並將其子控制項整合至 Web 組件個人化處理，使其可做為真正控制項。Includes and integrates its child control into the Web Parts personalization process so that it can act as a true control. 這會自動發生，因此開發人員可以使用 Web 組件的應用程式中的伺服器控制項和使用者控制項。This occurs automatically, which makes it simple for developers to use server controls and user controls in Web Parts applications.|會自動包含在 Web 組件個人化程序。Is automatically included in the Web Parts personalization process.| |可以在執行階段以程式設計方式存取 (使用方法並傳遞給它的子伺服器控制項)，例如 true控制項或標準的 ASP.NET 控制項。Can be accessed programmatically at run time (by using the method and passing to it the child server control), like a true control or a standard ASP.NET control.|可以存取以程式設計方式在執行階段，就像標準的 ASP.NET 控制項一樣。Can be accessed programmatically at run time, like a standard ASP.NET control.| 使用者可獲得控制，因為它提供一致的使用者體驗。Users benefit from the control because it provides a consistent user experience. 任何伺服器控制項可以對函式，例如控制項，並會有相同的一致的使用者介面 (UI) 元素，例如動詞命令、 圖示、 標題和標頭。Any server control can be made to function like a control, and will have the same consistent user interface (UI) elements such as verbs, icons, a title, and a header. 開發人員受益於控制，因為它可讓它們重複使用現有的使用者控制項和網頁組件的應用程式中的伺服器控制項。Developers benefit from the control because it enables them to reuse existing user controls and server controls within Web Parts applications. > [!NOTE] > 當您建立網頁組件頁面時，您就不必採取任何動作來啟用現有的使用者控制項或自訂控制項與要包裝控制項。When you create Web Parts pages, you do not have to do anything to enable an existing user control or custom control to be wrapped with the control. 只要將您伺服器或使用者控制項加入區域，以程式設計方式或宣告中網頁的標記，並自動設定的 Web 組件控制項包裝您的控制項與在執行階段的物件。Simply add your server or user control to a zone, either programmatically or by declaring it in the page's markup, and the Web Parts control set automatically wraps your control with a object at run time. 因為伺服器控制項放在區域會以包裝控制項在執行階段，開發人員可以使用一般的伺服器和使用者控制項，正好，彷彿控制項。Because server controls that are placed in zones are wrapped with a control at run time, developers can use ordinary server and user controls exactly as if they were controls. 請注意，如果您宣告自訂控制項繼承自基底類別內，這些控制項不支援內建函式使用屬性。Note that, if you declare custom controls that inherit from the base class within a , these controls cannot support the use of the intrinsic properties. 因此，您不能宣告這類控制項，包括屬性，例如屬性屬性和屬性。Thus, you cannot declare the properties on such controls, including properties such as the property and the property. 相反地，其他類型的伺服器控制項 (例如控制項、 使用者控制項和自訂控制項繼承自) 可以宣告這些屬性，因為它們支援 expando 屬性的用法。In contrast, other types of server controls (such as controls, user controls, and custom controls that inherit from ) can declare these properties, because they support the use of expando properties. Expando 屬性是實際的字串，可以加入至類別動態屬性，藉由介面。Expando properties are actually strings that can be added to a class dynamically as a property, by means of the interface. 實作此介面的控制項包括類別及其子系中，可以使用 expando 屬性。Controls that implement this interface, including the class and its children, can use expando properties. 因為基底類別不支援 expando 屬性，自訂控制項時，繼承自類別會放在包裝和控制項在執行階段，Web 組件控制集無法以動態方式新增內建自訂控制項的屬性。Because the base class does not support expando properties, when a custom control that inherits from the class is placed in a and wrapped with a control at run time, the Web Parts control set cannot dynamically add the intrinsic properties to the custom control. 在此情況下，您有兩個選擇。You have two choices in this case. 您可以使用自訂控制項，而不需要屬性，也可以實作自訂控制項，讓它使用的屬性中的介面。You can use the custom control without the properties, or you can implement the interface in the custom control, enabling it to use the properties. 如需如何的範例控制項繼承自可以使用屬性，如果您宣告的 ASP.NET控制項中頁面的標記 (內區域) 在設計階段，即使這個控制項不會繼承從類別和原生 neobsahuje成員，您能仍將其視為完全相同控制項。As an example of how controls that inherit from can use the properties, if you declare an ASP.NET control in the markup of a page (within a zone) at design time, even though this control does not inherit from the class and does not natively contain members, you can still treat it exactly like a control. 您可以宣告行事曆上的內容控制項，例如， ，和其他人。You can declare properties on the calendar control, such as , , and others. 在執行階段，您可以使用方法，以傳回控制項，以動態方式包裝月曆控制項中，與其以程式設計的方式運作，完全如同控制項，以存取完全相同屬性、 事件和方法。At run time, you can use the method, which returns the control that is dynamically wrapping the calendar control, and work with it programmatically exactly as you would with a control, with access to all the same properties, events, and methods. 控制項有很重要的屬性，可讓您存取其基礎的伺服器控制項：屬性。The control has a critical property that allows you to access its underlying server control: the property. 這個屬性可讓開發人員以程式設計方式存取伺服器控制項。This property allows developers to programmatically access the server control. 屬性也會使用控制項子控制項，存取個人化資料，以及執行授權，如果屬性設定。The property is also used by the control to access personalization data from the child control, and to perform authorization, if the property is set. 控制項有幾個其他屬性，其中的所有覆寫繼承自基底屬性類別。The control has several other properties, all of which override properties inherited from the base class. 如所述，您可以使用這些屬性和任何子控制項，以便它可以做控制項。As noted, you can use these properties with any child control, so that it can behave as a control. 其中一個重要屬性是屬性; 它會判斷是否所有匯出的屬性，或僅限標示為非敏感性，可以匯出。One important property is the property; it determines whether all the exportable properties, or only those marked as non-sensitive, can be exported. UI 導向屬性繼承自類別，例如， ， ， ， ，和，可以是任何伺服器控制項宣告式標記中設定置於區域。The UI-oriented properties inherited from the class, such as , , , , , and , can be set in the declarative markup for any server control that is placed in a zone. 中重要的方法類別包含方法會建立集合的控制項 （包括子控制項） 相關聯控制項，而方法，這個方法會委派 (delegate) 到所有的轉譯已包裝的子控制項。Important methods in the class include the method, which creates the collection of controls (including child controls) associated with a control, and the method, which delegates all rendering to the wrapped child controls. 在建構函式類別受到保護，並僅供內部使用，或是為擴充性案例。The constructors on the class are protected and are intended either for internal use or for extensibility scenarios. 有一些其他實用的深入解析使用控制項。There are some additional helpful insights for working with controls. 如果您想要設定中的覆寫屬性的預設值類別，您的使用者控制項或自訂伺服器控制項可以實作和介面，並覆寫其成員。If you want to set default values for the overridden properties in the class, your user control or custom server control can implement the and interfaces, and override their members. 在執行階段，控制項將獲得實作介面的子控制項的實作的屬性及其值。At run time, the control will get its values for the implemented properties from the child control that implements the interfaces. 如果您的控制項就會將其任一屬性定義為可個人化 (利用`Personalizable`中繼資料屬性)，則控制項上會自動啟用這些屬性在執行階段，就像可個人化內容的個人化控制項。If your control defines any of its properties as personalizable (by using the `Personalizable` metadata attribute), the control automatically enables those properties for personalization at run time, just like the personalizable properties on a control. 如果您想要為您的控制項提供 Web 組件的編輯功能，您可以實作介面。If you want to provide Web Parts editing features for your control, you can implement the interface. 在執行階段，當呼叫方法時，控制項的程式碼，如屬性會呼叫相同的屬性，子控制項，並使用子控制項的實作來建立相關聯的自訂控制項。At run time, when the method is called, the control's code for the property will call into the same property in the child control, and use the child control's implementation to create associated custom controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制項自動換行不是伺服器控制項控制項在執行階段。The following code example demonstrates how the control automatically wraps a server control that is not a control at run time. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分包含具有兩個 Web 組件頁面控制項。The first part of the code example contains a Web Parts page with two controls. 每個區域中是標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項。Within each zone is a standard ASP.NET server control. 因為控制項處於區域，他們就會自動換行以控制當編譯的頁面。Because the controls are in a zone, they will be automatically wrapped with a control when the page is compiled. 因此，您可以宣告類別在這些控制項上的內容。So, you can declare class properties on these controls. 您將頁面載入瀏覽器中，如果您按一下後**顯示所有的屬性值**按鈕，詳細資料標籤 中會顯示每個控制項。After you load the page in a browser, if you click the **Display All Property Values** button, the details for each control are displayed in a label. 顯示如何控制的運作方式，控制項中第一個區域有一些內中的宣告式標記的.aspx 網頁，而設定的屬性控制項並不會。To show how the control works, the control in the first zone has some of the properties set in the declarative markup of the .aspx page, whereas the control does not. 將頁面載入之後，請注意兩個控制項的屬性值的差異，兩者都有父代控制項。After you load the page, note the differences in the property values for the two controls, and that both have a parent control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分示範所存取的某些屬性的部分類別以程式設計方式控制。The second part of the code example shows a partial class that accesses some properties of the control programmatically. 請注意，在`Page_Load`方法中，方法來擷取執行階段執行個體的伺服器控制項包裝的控制。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the method is used to retrieve the run-time instance of the control that wraps a server control. 這種方法是取得父代的參考控制項可讓您以程式設計方式使用一般的伺服器或使用者控制項，就好像控制項在執行階段。This approach of getting a reference to the parent control enables you to work programmatically with an ordinary server or user control as if it were a control at run time. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#3)]

para.span: 有一些情況下就必須繼承自類別。

span.span: There are few occasions where it is necessary to inherit from the class.

para.span: 這種情況會是開發人員要實作建構函式中的某些自訂動作時建立控制項。

span.span: One such case would be if a developer wants to implement some custom action in the constructor when a control is created.

para.span: 例如，您可能想要儲存子控制項內的控制項集合以外的地方類別。

span.span: For example, you might want to store the child control somewhere other than the control collection within the class.

para.span: 如果您繼承自類別，您也需要繼承自類別並覆寫其讓它能夠建立您的自訂控制項的方法。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you also need to inherit from the class and override its method to enable it to create your custom control.
Introduction to Web Parts

param.span: 伺服器控制項，其成為 控制項執行個體的子控制項。

span.span: A server control that becomes the child control of the control instance.

summary.span: 藉由將參考傳遞至成為子控制項的控制項，初始化 控制項的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a control by passing in a reference to a control that becomes the child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會呼叫控制中其方法，來初始化的執行個體控制項在其子伺服器控制項的參考傳遞。The constructor is called by the control in its method, to initialize an instance of a control by passing in a reference to a child server control. 在後建立物件時，您可以參考子控制項使用屬性。After the object is created, you can reference the child control using the property.

member this.CatalogIconImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定至影像的 URL，該影像表示控制項目錄中的 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a control in a catalog of controls.

value.span: 字串，表示至影像的 URL，該影像用於表示目錄中的控制項。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in a catalog.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件應用程式通常會提供使用者可以加入至網頁的控制項類別目錄 （或清單）。Web Parts applications often provide a catalog (or list) of controls that users can add to a page. 控制項上的屬性包含出現在類別目錄時，代表控制項的影像的 URL。The property on a control contains the URL to an image that represents the control when it appears in a catalog. 這個屬性覆寫基底屬性，好讓您可以存取子控制項上的屬性，如同它是真正控制項。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在您的網頁、 宣告式標記中的控制項上設定屬性的值，以及程式設計方式所示。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要使用控制項時，則您可以提供屬性的預設值，您可以實作介面。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例的完整原始程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到概觀主題。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何屬性以宣告方式設定內的伺服器控制項上控制項。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範以程式設計方式存取屬性的值，當使用者按一下的方法**顯示所有的屬性值** 按鈕。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method that programmatically accesses the value of the property when a user clicks the **Display All Property Values** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得在執行階段，由 控制項包裝之子控制項的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the child control that is wrapped by a control at run time.
A that refers to the wrapped child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供方法來存取所包裝的子控制項控制項。The property provides the means to access the child control wrapped by a control. 例如，控制項會使用來個人化資料擷取的子控制項的屬性。For example, the control uses the property to extract personalization data from the child control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 若要擷取的子控制項的相關資訊以程式設計方式存取屬性控制項。The property is accessed programmatically to retrieve information about the child control of a control. 此範例的完整原始程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到概觀主題。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫，通知使用組合實作的伺服器控制項來建立所包含的任何子控制項，以準備回傳或呈現。

span.span: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.

summary.span: 覆寫基底方法，以建立唯讀集合，該集合包含 控制項包裝的子控制項。

span.span: Overrides the base method to create a read-only collection that consists of the child control wrapped by a control.
A that contains the child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立私用、 唯讀集合，其中包含單一的控制項，也就是子控制項的控制項。The method creates a private, read-only collection that consists of a single control, which is the child control of a control. 讓開發人員不能以手動方式新增其他控制項來建立這個集合控制項。This collection is created so that developers cannot manually add other controls to a control. 如果您想要建立自訂控制項而不加入私用集合的子控制項，您可以從衍生類別中覆寫建構函式，並提供不同的方法，用於儲存子控制項所參考屬性。If you want to create a custom control without adding the child control to the private collection, you can derive from the class, override the constructor, and provide a different method for storing the child control referenced by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection
public: override System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::EditorPartCollection ^ CreateEditorParts();
override this.CreateEditorParts : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 傳回自訂 控制項的集合，在 控制項的子控制項處於編輯模式時，可以使用這些控制項編輯它。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom controls that can be used to edit the child control of a control when it is in edit mode.

returns.span: ，包含與伺服器控制項相關聯的自訂 控制項。

span.span: An that contains custom controls associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會在控制項進入編輯顯示模式時呼叫。The method is called when a control enters edit display mode. 這個方法會覆寫繼承自的基底方法類別，因為，若是控制項，它是子控制項所編輯，不控制項本身。This method overrides the base method inherited from the class because, in the case of a control, it is the child control that is being edited, not the control itself. 方法會轉換至的子控制項介面，可讓要編輯的控制項。The method casts the child control to the interface, which enables the control to be edited. 此覆寫的方法可讓伺服器控制項不是衍生自類別，包括 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，以及自訂伺服器控制項-編輯正常控制項。This overridden method is what enables server controls that do not derive from the class--including ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls--to be edited as normal controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Description { get; set; }
.property instance string Description
Public Overrides Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定簡短片語，概括控制項的功能，用於伺服器控制項的工具提示和目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what a control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of server controls.

value.span: 字串，簡要概括控制項的功能。

span.span: A string that briefly summarizes the control's functionality.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值通常是當做描述性字串中提供的伺服器控制項清單的目錄控制項以及控制項的標題列中的工具提示。The property value is typically used as a descriptive string for a control in catalogs that provide lists of server controls, and as a ToolTip in a control's title bar. 屬性的內容中會出現工具提示使用者將滑鼠指標置於控制項的標題列中的標題文字。The content of the property appears in a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title text in a control's title bar. 這個屬性覆寫基底屬性，好讓您可以存取子控制項上的屬性，如同它是真正控制項。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在您的網頁、 宣告式標記中的控制項上設定屬性的值，以及程式設計方式所示。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要使用控制項時，則您可以提供屬性的預設值，您可以實作介面。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例的完整原始程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到概觀主題。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何屬性以宣告方式設定內的伺服器控制項上控制項。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，以程式設計的方式，以在標籤中顯示它的值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Subtitle As String

summary.span: 取得與 屬性值串連的字串，以形成控制項的完整標題。

span.span: Gets a string that is concatenated with the property value to form a complete title for a control.

value.span: 字串，做為控制項的副標題。

span.span: A string that serves as a subtitle for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用（選擇性） 要傳回標準的子標題字串，將會附加至您的自訂屬性控制項的標題。Use the property optionally to return a standard subtitle string that will be appended to your custom control's title. 這個屬性覆寫基底屬性，好讓您可以存取子控制項上的屬性，如同它是真正控制項。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 如果您實作中的使用者控制項或提供的預設值的自訂控制項的屬性，自動設定的 Web 組件控制項將其附加至控制項的值屬性在執行階段建立的完整標題。If you implement the property in a user control or custom control to provide a default value, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the control's property at run time to create a complete title.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of a control.

value.span: 表示組件控制項標題的字串。

span.span: A string that represents the title of the part control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件控制項的標題列中顯示的標題文字由設定屬性。The visible title text in a part control's title bar is set by the property. 如果您未提供控制項的標題，自動設定的 Web 組件控制項就會計算為標題使用的預設字串。If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 此外，就可以提供預設副標題附加至標題字串。Also, it is possible to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the title string. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see . 這個屬性覆寫基底屬性，好讓您可以存取子控制項上的屬性，如同它是真正控制項。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在您的網頁、 宣告式標記中的控制項上設定屬性的值，以及程式設計方式所示。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要使用控制項時，則您可以提供屬性的預設值，您可以實作介面。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例的完整原始程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到概觀主題。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何屬性以宣告方式設定內的伺服器控制項上控制項。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，以程式設計的方式，以在標籤中顯示它的值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得或設定至影像的 URL，該影像用於表示控制項標題列中的 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a control in the control's own title bar.

value.span: 字串，表示至影像的 URL。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來建立關聯的圖示與控制項。The property provides a way to associate an icon with a control. 圖示會出現在控制項標題列中。The icon appears in the control's own title bar. 基於主題的一致性，應用程式開發人員通常具有此圖示類似圖，代表目錄中的 Web 組件控制項的控制項 (在參照映像屬性)。For thematic consistency, application developers often make this icon similar to the image that represents the control in a catalog of Web Parts controls (the image referenced in the property). 因為它實作 Web 組件控制集，屬性可個人化變更影像或圖示顯示在控制項的標題列中的使用者。As it is implemented in the Web Parts control set, the property can be personalized by end users to change the image or icon that appears in a control's title bar. 這個屬性覆寫基底屬性，好讓您可以存取子控制項上的屬性，如同它是真正控制項。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在您的網頁、 宣告式標記中的控制項上設定屬性的值，以及程式設計方式所示。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要使用控制項時，則您可以提供屬性的預設值，您可以實作介面。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例的完整原始程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到概觀主題。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何屬性以宣告方式設定內的伺服器控制項上控制項。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，以程式設計的方式，以在標籤中顯示它的值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

member this.TitleUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定至 控制項之補充資訊的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a control.

value.span: 字串，表示至 控制項之詳細資訊的 URL。

span.span: A string that represents a URL to more information about a control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將指派到的 URL屬性，該控制項的標題就會成為連結。When you assign a URL to the property, the title of the control becomes a link. 這個屬性會提供讓使用者存取控制的其他資訊的便利方式。This property provides a convenient way for end users to access additional information about a control. 其他資訊可能包括著作權的資料，連絡資料，關於控制項的建立者或控制項的用途的摘要詳細資料。The additional information could include copyright data, contact data, details about the creator of the control, or a summary of the purpose of a control. 這個屬性覆寫基底屬性，好讓您可以存取子控制項上的屬性，如同它是真正控制項。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在您的網頁、 宣告式標記中的控制項上設定屬性的值，以及程式設計方式所示。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要使用控制項時，則您可以提供屬性的預設值，您可以實作介面。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例的完整原始程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到概觀主題。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何屬性以宣告方式設定內的伺服器控制項上控制項。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，以程式設計的方式，以在標籤中顯示它的值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection Verbs { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection Verbs
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Verbs As WebPartVerbCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartVerbCollection ^ Verbs { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartVerbCollection ^ get(); };
member this.Verbs : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection

summary.span: 取得與 控制項相關聯之自訂動詞命令的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of custom verbs associated with a control.

value.span: ，包含與 控制項相關聯的自訂 物件。

span.span: A that contains custom objects associated with a control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動詞命令是衍生自類別，並提供使用者介面 (UI) 動作，使用者可以執行控制項。Verbs derive from the class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a control. 通常，在 UI 中做為按鈕、 連結或功能表項目表示動詞命令。Usually, verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items. 有開啟、 關閉、 編輯和最小化控制項，以及匯出控制項定義或說明檔案載入其他動詞命令的標準動詞命令。There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file. 中不包含這些動詞集合，因為集合包含自訂的動詞命令。These verbs are not included in the collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs. 這個屬性覆寫基底屬性，好讓您可以存取子控制項上的屬性，如同它是真正控制項。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 如果您子控制項實作介面，因此覆寫其屬性，控制項使用的子控制項的實作時屬性上叫用控制項。If you child control implements the interface and thus overrides its property, the control uses the child control's implementation when the property is invoked on the control. 當您建立自訂動詞命令，並將其新增至集合，然後您可以存取的動詞命令，以程式設計方式從控制項。When you create custom verbs and add them to the collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override object WebBrowsableObject { get; }
.property instance object WebBrowsableObject
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property WebBrowsableObject As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ WebBrowsableObject { System::Object ^ get(); };
member this.WebBrowsableObject : obj

summary.span: 取得子控制項的參考，以讓自訂 控制項可以編輯該控制項。

span.span: Gets a reference to the child control, to enable the control to be edited by custom controls.

value.span: ，包含 控制項的子控制項。

span.span: An that consists of the child control of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果子控制項實作介面，並覆寫其屬性，當使用者選取編輯控制項控制項將子控制項，透過呼叫屬性，並使用子系控制項的實作方法。If a child control implements the interface, and overrides its property, when a user selects the control for editing, the control will call into the child control through the property, and use the child control's implementation of the method. 這項機制可讓您不是伺服器或使用者控制才能使用相關聯的自訂控制項Web 組件應用程式中的控制項。This mechanism allows a server or user control that is not a control to work with custom associated controls in a Web Parts application.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit Width { get; set; }

member this.Width : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的寬度 (以字元為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the control.
A that indicates the width of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性覆寫基底屬性，讓您可以取得或設定上的子控制項的寬度，就如同它是真正控制項。This property overrides the base property so that you can get or set the width on the child control as if it were a true control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
